page.title: Priority Banking Account
page.tab:
Expect an exclusive experience with Hong Leong Priority Banking, where your total banking and transaction needs will be managed by a dedicated Relationship Manager, and a team of Product Specialists and Customer Service Executives.

Hong Leong Priority Banking promises you a new level of banking to meet your priorities in life, make your financial goals attainable and help enhance your lifestyle.

Your exclusive Priority Banking membership goes beyond the way you bank and into the way you live, with unique lifestyle benefits such as luxurious accommodation offers, dining privileges, SPA/gym and golfing privileges, and more.

Key Features and Benefits:

  • Access money easily with ATMs 24/7
  • Get your ATM card immediately when opening account
  • Earn interest on daily balances
  • Overdraft facility is offered upon arrangement
  • One cheque book free per month with 25 cheques
  • Free monthly statement

Eligibility:

  • You must be 18 years old or above
  • Minimum initial Deposit is USD 50,000
  • Minimum balance requirement is USD 25,000
  • This account is available to individual or joint account holders.

Document requirements for account opening:

  • Primary document:
    • Cambodia National Identification Card; or
    • Passport
  • Any two of the below secondary documents in case the primary document is not available:
    • Birth certificate
    • Resident book
    • Marriage certificate
    • Residential Certificate by an official authority
    • Family book with photo of head of family
    • Driving license issued by an official authority
